data.name: Fishing Planet: Metalhead Motorboat Pack
data.detailed_description:
Excited to see what fishing from a motorboat is all about? Then this pack is for you!
Complete with the super durable flat bottomed Apus™ aluminium motorboat from Flaggmann™, the Metalhead Motorboat Pack also includes a wonderful combo of Loki™ and Hornet Swarm™ Special Edition rod’n’reel, tons of minnows, jerkbaits, a few crankbaits and other fishing equipment that you’ll need for a splendid day out on the river!
Not to mention that with 7-Day Pond Passes and Advanced Licenses for five awesome fishing destinations, including the fantastic Saint-Croix Lake and gorgeous Tiber River in Italy, the Metalhead Motorboat Pack will take your angling explorations to a much faster level!

Metalhead Motorboat Pack includes:
* 40 000 CREDITS
* 20 BAITCOINS
* 7-DAY PREMIUM
* 5 Marker Buoys
* 1 Storage Box (10 Slots)
* 1 Tackle Setups

MOTOR BOATS
* Flaggmann™ Apus Motor Boat - Length: 11 ft.(330 cm); Width: 3.2 ft.(100 cm); Weight: 198 lb (90 kg); Engine: 10 hp; Echo Sounder: Advanced

RODS ‘N REELS
Rods:
* Loki 230 SE - Length: 7' 7"(2.3 m); Lure Weight: 5/7 – 2 1/3 Oz.(20-65 g); Power: Heavy; Line Weight: 6–24 Lb.(3.5–11 kg); Action: Moderate
Reels:
* Hornet Swarm 5000 SE - Ratio: 5.0:1; Recovery: 35.5"(90 cm); Capacity: mono 32/100(0.5/100), braid 30/170(0.28/170); Max Drag: 20.9 Lb.(9.5 kg); Drag: front

TERMINAL TACKLE
* Lines - Length 1000 yd (1000 m):
Fluoro .016" (0.4 mm) - Test: 20 Lb. (9.1 kg)
* Minnows: Hunched Runner (x6)
* Jerkbaits: Jerkbait #6/0 (x4)
* Crankbait 5 m, #3/0 (x2)

EQUIPMENT
* GarryScott™ FishFort S Plus - Max Single Fish Weight: 77 Lb.(35 kg); Total Fish Weight: 264 Lb.(120 kg);

POND PASSES (7 days):
Emerald Lake
Tiber River
White Moose Lake
St Croix Lake
San Joaquin Delta

FISHING LICENSES (7 days):
Advanced New York License
Advanced Italy License
Advanced Alberta License
Advanced Michigan License
Advanced California License

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS Version - Windows 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10 x64
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1,6 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370X 2 GB GDDR5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
